item.title: Nimbots: serverless virtual robots
item.description: FaasWars is a programming game where you have to write the code that controls a robot fighting to death with another robot. The robot is a starship that can move in the space and shoot bullets. The goal of the game is to defeat the enemy robot, hitting it 5 times, and of course avoiding the bullets of the enemy. To control a robot you have to write the control code.
